Address.label: Address
Address.value: 700 S RENTON VILLAGE PLACE,SEVENTH FLOOR, TRITON TOWER TWO 700 S RENTON VILLAGE PLACE, SEVENTH FLOOR, RENTON, Washington, 98057, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Radiant Logistics Inc operates as a third-party logistics company, providing multi-modal transportation and logistics services primarily to customers based in the United States and Canada. The company offers domestic and international air and ocean freight forwarding services and freight brokerage services including truckload services, less than truckload (LTL) services, and intermodal services. The company has two operating segments: the United States and Canada. Maximum revenue is generated in the United States.

value.name: Laurent Grousseau
value.title: Chief Technology Officer & Senior Vice President
